Rooms.description: This room is damp and scary
You had to jump down from the previous room, looks like there's no way back up. There's also a strange smell in this room
The floor is a bit slimy here, ugh.
It's fairly dark here, I need to strain to see anything.
There's a pedestal here, looks like a round object would fit in here
Rooms.winningMessage: You place the orb on the prdestal. There's a deep rumbling, feels like an earthquake... Suddenly, sunlight appears as a panel in the wall opens. Congratulations, you've escaped!
